overview: Smart, sexy Kayden Kross knows how to work the legal system! She's just been made junior partner at her law firm, and her first case is defending her ever-horny assistant for having sex in public! Researching the naughty thrill of XXX on display, Kayden spreads lips and labia in front of an open window, and observes just how many of her office mates get off on getting off in public. When the well-hung DA won't take Kayden's plea, she shows him just what he's been missing...In Public!
title: Krossing The Bar
